COVIDCert NI

Brief:

COVIDCert NI serves as an invaluable tool for Northern Ireland residents, allowing them to display a domestic vaccination certificate with ease. This app provides a convenient method to showcase vaccination status for domestic purposes or while traveling, with enhanced privacy and security features.
